org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting.functions

Class FRForceApplicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.AbstractRichFunction
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichJoinFunction<LVertex,Force,LVertex>
        • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.operators.layouting.functions.FRForceApplicator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.Function, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.JoinFunction<LVertex,Force,LVertex>, org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichFunction

    public class FRForceApplicator
extends org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichJoinFunction<LVertex,Force,LVertex>
    Applies forces to vertices. Uses simulated annealing with exponentially decreasing temperature. Confines new coordinates to the layouting-space
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        width - The width of the layouting-space
        height - The height of the layouting-space
        k - A parameter of the FR-Algorithm.
        maxIterations - Number of iterations the FR-Algorithm will have

      • apply

        public void apply(LVertex vertex,
                  Force force,
                  double speedLimit)
        Apply force to vertex. Honors speedLimit and vertex-mass. Confines position to layout-area.
        Parameters:
        vertex - Vertex to move
        force - Force acting on the vertex
        speedLimit - Current speedLimit
